flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: ScaleModelPlans.com creates model structure plans for just about every scale of model railroad. Using a free software program you can use these plans to create very realistic model buildings from phot paper or cardstock.
guide.introduction_rendered: ScaleModelPlans.com creates model structure plans for just about every scale of model railroad. Using a free software program you can use these plans to create very realistic model buildings from phot paper or cardstock.
guide.summary: Using free "GIMP" software and downloadable structure plans to create realistic model railroad structures.
guide.title: Cardstock Modeling
